meanings.definition: Shining brightly or with a sparkling light.
meanings.sent1: The sunflower looked the gleamiest in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Her gleamiest smile lit up the room.
meanings.sent3: The cat's eyes were the gleamiest when it spotted a shiny toy.
meanings.sent4: The gleamiest stars in the sky guided the lost travelers.
meanings.sent5: The gleamiest diamond in the jewelry store caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: Having the most gleam or shine.
meanings.sent1: Among all the cars, his was the gleamiest after the wash.
meanings.sent2: The trophy for the competition was awarded to the gleamiest participant.
meanings.sent3: The gleamiest shoes at the party were the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were the gleamiest when she saw her favorite dessert.
meanings.sent5: The gleamiest armor in the kingdom belonged to the brave knight.
